Guest speaker: Robert Kosara

Feb 17, 2016

We had Robert Kosara from Tableau come in today and give a presentation on visual storytelling.

Here are the links from his talk:

  • Dr. Kosara’s website
  • Connected scatter plot paper
  • Willard Brinton’s graphical methods book
  • ​100 years of data viz
  • ISOTYPE
  • Dr. Kosara’s ISOTYPE paper
  • ​NYT older adult care facility resident viz
  • Measles viz from the Guardian
  • ​Hack your way to scientific glory from fivethrityeight
  • ​Explorable explanations that includes a segregation viz

​Next week we’ll be going over applying viz to health and healthcare.

Biomedical Visualization

  • Biomedical Visualization

In BIME 591, we explore visualizations used in biomedicine. The class covers theory and practice of data visualization, visualization design, guest speakers, and a group project.
